data.name: Find the longest streak
data.description:
Your friend Johnny needs your help! Users of his app, TaskTracker, would like to see their longest completion streak (the number of consecutive days they've completed 100% of their tasks). When a user completes all of their tasks for a particular day, that day get's added to their completion table: [Aug/18/2014,
Aug/19/2014,
Aug/24/2014,
Aug/29/2014]
=>The longest streak is 2 days. [Aug/18/2014,
Aug/29/2014]
=>The longest streak is 1 day. What you need to do: Johnny needs you to write a method that returns the longest streak for a user. * The longest_streak method should accept one argument, which will be an array of Date instances. * This array is already sorted in ascending order. Good luck!
